front.title: IPv6 Router Advertisement Options for DNS Configuration

abstract.t: This document specifies IPv6 Router Advertisement (RA) options (called DNS RA options) to allow IPv6 routers to advertise a list of DNS recursive server addresses and a DNS Search List to IPv6 hosts. This document, which obsoletes RFC 6106, defines a higher default value of the lifetime of the DNS RA options to reduce the likelihood of expiry of the options on links with a relatively high rate of packet loss.
